div.h2:
Built on Tradition,
Focused on the Future

p.span: âMy life remains rooted in my experience at New Castle High School. There I learned what community meant â along with the sense of place and responsibility it entails. It was a place for a student like me to take a risk, try new things, make mistakes and discover my unique passions. The best opportunities I had at New Castle High School were the ones I was able to invent for myself with the help of a teacher or a community member. It takes a special type of environment that can foster this sense of community and an environment of opportunity.â
J.W. Pindell, Class of 1997, Political Reporter for The Boston Globe

div.blockquote: Studying foreign language has broadened my understanding of the world and its cultures.

a.p:
Good Morning,
Yesterday afternoon Governor Holcomb announced schools shall not conduct in-person instruction for the remainder of the year. ELearning will continue w/ a new modified schedule to meet Ind. requirements. I will call out new info this afternoon & post changes online.
